title: Nicolae Gîju
text: Nicolae Gîju (born 4 October 1943) is a Romanian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201968%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Bantamweight">men's bantamweight</a> event at the <a href="1968%20Summer%20Olympics">1968 Summer Olympics</a>.
